CustomField.formula: IF( OR(ISPICKVAL(order_status__c, 'Confirmed'),ISPICKVAL(order_status__c, 'Exported') ,ISPICKVAL(order_status__c, 'Ready For Export')), IF( solo_traveller__c , qty__c , IF( MOD(PAX_Travelling__c,2) = 0, (PAX_Travelling__c/2), (PAX_Travelling__c - 1)/2 ) ) ,0 )
CustomField.label: Cabins Required
